chunk:
INIKA Organic Soothing Gel Mask

Brand: INIKA Organic

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice*, Propanediol, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Xanthan Gum, Cetearyl Alcohol, Saccharide Isomerate, Tanacetum Annuum (Blue Tansy) Flower Oil, Selaginella Lepidophylla (Rose of Jericho) Extract, Tocopherol (Vitamin E),

pherol (Vitamin E), Glycine Soja (Soybean) Seed Extract, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Lactobacillus Ferment (Probiotic), Kaolin, Hydrated Silica, Aqua (Water), Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Benzyl Alcohol, Ultramarines (CI 77007), Linalool

Directions: Gently apply a generous amount to cleansed skin, avoiding the eye and li

iding the eye and lip areas. Leave for 10-15 soothing minutes. Rinse well with cool water. Use 1-2 times per week.

Warnings: Patch test recommended. Store below 30 °C.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
